news.title: Beloved pop star Connie Francis dies at 87
news.summary: The 'Pretty Little Baby' singer was named one of the greatest female recording artists of all time.

news.title: Netflix announces release date and first look images of Colin Farrell film Ballad Of A Small Player
news.summary: Colin Farrell stars in film adaptation of Lawrence Osborne's 2014 Novel.

news.title: Fire destroys main stage at Tomorrowland festival
news.summary: The festival is still set to take place as planned.

news.title: French town pulls funding for festival over KNEECAP booking
news.summary: "The amount was adopted before the definitive program of the festival was known," wrote the town's mayor.

news.title: Blood Orange to release first album in six years Essex Honey
news.summary: Two tracks from the album, ‘Mind Loaded’ and ‘Somewhere In Between’, are out now.

news.title: White Lies announce new album Night Light
news.summary: In the meantime, check out their latest single 'In The Middle' below

news.title: Terry Hall's Laugh to be reissued in deluxe edition
news.summary: 28 years after its original release, Laugh will return with new tracks and visual content.

news.title: SZA says AI is causing "environmental racism"
news.summary: Research has found that using AI (artificial intelligence) has major environmental implications due to its vast energy and water usage

news.title: We've Only Just Begun Festival announces day-by-day breakdown and stage times
news.summary: The three-night festival is back at Whelan's this August

news.title: Robert Plant announces new album Saving Grace
news.summary: The record comes out on September 26 via Nonesuch Records.
